content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, James. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I would like to discuss the rental price with you first. May I know what price range you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible, but I am also willing to negotiate if the landlord is willing to lower the price. Can you give me an idea of the current rental price?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, James. Based on the current market in Mannheim, I am looking for a rental price of 700 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating if you are willing to accept a lower price. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to negotiate, but I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition and that it will be available for my move-in date. Can you assure me of these two things?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Of course, James. I can assure you that the apartment is in good condition and will be available for your move-in date. I have recently renovated the apartment and it is fully furnished with modern appliances and fixtures. I am also happy to provide you with references from my previous tenants who can attest to the quality of the property and my reliability as a landlord. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
